context: Filming started in Austria in <a0_0><b7_0>December 2014<b7_0/><a0_0/>, with production taking in the area around Sölden—including the Ötztal Glacier Road, <a6_0>Rettenbach glacier<a6_0/> and the adjacent ski resort and cable car station—and Obertilliach and Lake Altaussee, before concluding in <a1_0>February 2015<a1_0/>. Scenes filmed in Austria centred on the <a2_0><a4_0><b8_0><b9_0>Ice Q Restaurant<b9_0/><b8_0/><a4_0/><a2_0/>, standing in for the fictional Hoffler Klinik, a private medical <b10_0>clinic<b10_0/> in the <a5_0><b11_0>Austrian Alps<b11_0/>.<a5_0/> Filming included an action scene featuring a Land Rover Defender Bigfoot and a Range Rover Sport. Production was temporarily halted first by an injury to Craig, who sprained his <a3_0>knee<a3_0/> whilst shooting a fight scene, and later by an accident involving a filming vehicle that saw three crew members injured, at least one of them seriously.
